website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei Mate 30 Pro offers powerful performance and one of the best smartphone cameras on the market, but you can't get in the US.

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, but NOT dual SIM
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, great phone, but the version being sold on Amazon UK as Dual Sim is only a Single Sim version.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Boardman

customer_reviews.title: It’s not dual sim!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was advertised as dual sim, it’s not. I see the description has now been changed and no mention of dual sim, too late! You’re getting it back!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Christopher Lee

customer_reviews.title: Single sim not dual
customer_reviews.text: This phone is single sim and not dual sim ❌
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: FALSE PROMOTIONS
customer_reviews.text: The phone isn’t as good for the price payed, also a promotion was stated before 4th April and they lied about it.
customer_reviews.author: Maite Moreira / Hasib Sahel

customer_reviews.title: You will love it but hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the fast delivery and the case. To be honest, I love the phone. Even Without Google products which can be super frustrating. And it is such a new phone, getting any assistance online is difficult. The support centre is terrible. And, Blatently huawei do not care about UK customers. And, you cannot use your phone for payment. It is restricted in the UK. Some bank apps will not work. But, it is like driving an alfa romeo... The car is expensive and always breaks down, but you will always love an alfa romeo.
customer_reviews.author: Nadhiir

customer_reviews.title: Screen cracks easily
customer_reviews.text: This phone looked great, but the screen cracked on it after less than a week, and despite being in a case with a screen protector. That's never happened to me with any phone before ever. Huwai are offering free screen replacements for the first month of purchase to all users, so that suggests to me they are aware of the phones lack of structural integrity
customer_reviews.author: Prison_Moon

customer_reviews.title: True camera powerhouse and looks to envy for
customer_reviews.text: Camera quality is way above the race from any handset out there currently. If you are into photography this should be your goto choice. Further battery life on a normal use stays for two days comfortably. Last but not the least its looks, its undoubtedly the best looking premium model in your hand. Design and color asthetics simply ace the charts. Display is not 10/10 under sun unlike other few flagships but its a personal choice. Happy purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: sumit kumar

customer_reviews.title: My third Huawai
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I might be giving all my data away to China, that's not part of this review. These phones are excellent. I didn't know until recently that the p stands for photography on this brand. I had a Mate 20 Pro before this which I have to my wife and I got this thinking it was a slight down grate as Mates were supposed to be better but in truth it's so similar, only the display is not quite as high res, although I can't tell even side by side. The camera is fantastic. A recent photo of the moon says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: P30 is an amazing phone, I'm still learning stuff it does every day. I personally didn't bother with the p30 Pro as couldn't warrent the extra money, and glad I didn't. I still miss ios operating system though, and if your not very tech savy I'd stick with ios as android just tends to be harder work. I think if Huawei do move away from android and start their own operating system it could be a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Sally4George

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Phone
customer_reviews.text: As a long time Apple iPhone user I had always found android phones flawed in one way or another, not so with Huawei, what a fantastic phone, it can outperform my iPhone . I was also pleasantly surprised to find that the model I was sent was a dual sim version, this is not the first Huawei I have owned, but it could possibly be the best. If you're thinking of buying this phone don't hesitate, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with battery life and camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been using mobile phones for 38 years I can remember carrying a huge device the size of a car battery and then going through the GSM revolution. Erricson, Nokia, Iphone, Blackberry Samsung and can only say this is an impressive phone, it looks good feels good has an intuitive software interface, packed full of features and even offers advice on using features. The battery life is impressive its lasting me a few days and I am a heavy user. The camera (s) are very impressive giving me excellent quality and night vision pictures are great, its well more that I appreciate but now I will try use more of the features.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a phone with great camera performance, and you shoot photos in low light then go no further. The battery life is great. Still got 40 ish percent at the end of the day every day. Camera is great and probably it does best shots in low light in current lineup. (as a phone of course) And its priced really well for what you are getting. (Especially after P40 was released)
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone, better than brilliant camera.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a brilliant phone. Best camera, especially night pics. My only small gripe is the facial recognition. It struggles with low light, which I find surprising considering everything else about the night camera is so good. I have the mate 20 Pro which is perfect for facial recognition but the p30 is definitely not as good. Would be nice to increase speaker volume more but this uses vibration on screen so no 'tweaking' like previous models through engineering mode. Having said that I love this phone and wouldn't change to anything else that's available right now. 9/10 the above points lose it 1 mark🙂
customer_reviews.author: Chumley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days, very, very pleased. I have given it top marks all round however, if I find issues then I will update in the future. This phone is definitely dual sim, I found that out as it has a two sided sim card holder and I initially placed mine in sim 2, then tried to set ringtone, it wouldn't change, so delving into "settings" I discovered why, took sim out and replaced in other side of holder, problem solved. Very satisfied customer. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Johnno

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the P20 Pro (I broke the screen and it totally died). The camera is noticably better and takes the most awesome videos! Good storage, really fast. I love the way the screen crosses over the edges - browsing the web and watching tv is a bit more of an immersive experience, The speakers work great, but to be honest I listen to all music through bluetooth headphones. Love it. Seller very friendly and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Discontent Melon

customer_reviews.title: Condition “like new” should be “off car boot”
customer_reviews.text: This item was described as like new. In this instance I would have expected a product that resembled getting a new product out of the box. It wasn’t full of scuffs on screen and scratches to camera lens. Charger is filthy and looks overused, far from “like new” condition if there was an option for zero stars I would have selected this.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: It's a lovely phone, cheers to Huawei for a wonderful design.
customer_reviews.text: Good specs ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ cameras ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Fast charging (very convenient) ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Just a wonderful phone. 👍🏾👍🏾 5 stars for the phone it self, I removed 2 stars because of poor, unsupportive and disrespectful customer service! No acknowledgement from online dispute resolution platform (ODR) either!! And its has been several months since I have made the complaint! I have had better experiences with sellers than Amazon. Contact sellers first, even some sellers advise you to do so first. NB, its not all Amazon customer rep, rude or disrespectful, just that one particular supervisor!
customer_reviews.author: Uber

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Having previously owned p10 lite I was very satisfied and decided to buy this but this was my biggest mistake. The only good thing about this phone is the battery life. It is not worth the money and after several month I had to buy a Samsung one. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosita

customer_reviews.title: Love my new phone
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Huawei phone. All I needed was little cheaper phone with great Camera and plenty of other things to do since iPhone and Samsung are ridiculously expensive lately. I would definitely recommend this phone if you're looking for affordable price range phones. Taking videos and pictures are super amazing. Fast loading and great for playing games my little one. Delivery and service were promt and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Guugii

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for the correct phone.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the phone on the 01/05/20. A cheaper phone was sent to me. Only Branded were difficult to contact. I have sent back the phone and am still waiting for the correct product. I have been without a phone for 6 weeks while still paying for a bill pay phone so am not impressed with Only Branded. So, I cannot review a phone I haven't seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone so much. first time same discound I missed. I keep the basket . When i see discound i quickly buy it. Everythink is good . The screen is clearn give eyes is comfortable. The battery is longer . I like huawei phones camera. Make the picture so nice and fresh. I don’t know who to say. Just i like so much . Good price ,high recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tilly

customer_reviews.title: Average and not the next gen jump i was after.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fast, camera is ace. Cons: Fingerprint reader works 1 out of 5 times first time. Playing audio from the jack is just hideous. I've never heard such quiet and tinny audio output from a phone before. If you care about audio DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE. The default keyboard is terribly designed. There is an incredibly annoying feature you cannot turn off without hacking it called HiSearch. Every time you swipe down on the screen it brings up a redundant overlay to search for apps. Purely awful. I'm considering returning and purchasing a v50.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for photographers astounding quality and night shots.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has 2 of them and this is exactly those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone brilliant photos
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone mainly because of its camera, but the total package is pretty good especially with the current low price. I chose to get the lower memory option then put a 256gig chip in the 2nd sim slot. Mutch cheaper than the larger memory option. I must admit I am over the moon with the performance. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this seller
customer_reviews.text: Gutted, I spoke to huawei direct, they sent me to the seller, the seller sent me to huawei, then they sent me back to the seller who's ignored me and now I'm stuck with an expensive phone showing signs of degrading! The charger port is very wobbly, moves quite a lot! Phone is mazing, try another seller or straight from huawei if you can, customer service sucks
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I'm Obsessed!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this phone. And the photos it takes are incredible, it got me back into photography!! Great processing speed, battery lasts more than 1 day, it charges in no time. It never crushed and the touch screen is soooo good too. I'm really really happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible charging port/cable
customer_reviews.text: Phone works well, though regular use of apps will drain the battery. As others have advised, the phone is a single SIM, not dual as originally advertised. The main and very serious issue is the charging port/cable. The cable supplied stopped working after 3 or 4 months, and a substitute cable I'm using has to be monitored as any slight movement may loosen the connection and the phone might not charge. What use is a phone if there is a risk that it won't keep charging successfully, hence the low rating.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: You're already know: this phone has the best camera I've ever seen. The zoom is simply insane. Plus it has a great design, it's not too big or too heavy, it's easy to use and the back colour makes it easy to spot it in a very messy bag. It's also one of the quickest phone I've ever had and it charges in 40min. Battery life last more or less 2 days with normal use (includes some phone calls).
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Lack of support and no push notifications
customer_reviews.text: No Google, no problem plenty of help on youtube. Only thing going for this phone is the camera. The push notifications don't work and technical support can't be bothered to reply. Very common fault across many of their phones. Wish I had seen this before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Stupoo

customer_reviews.title: Good phone , not as great as Google phone.
customer_reviews.text: Not up to my expectations.camera dose great job in a very limited occasion. I will go back to my Google phone which is still the best camera so far.....
customer_reviews.author: saeed

customer_reviews.title: A great smart mobil
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Huawei mobil. It's my third Huawei mobil. Very convenient, smart and fast without any problem. Must mention its camera, the pictures are amazing with color, night background. I have to choose this model made in 2019 because the regulation made by US. That's quite unfortunately as it makes people lose the chance to enjoy advanced technology.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Li

customer_reviews.title: A work in progress.
customer_reviews.text: Hardwarewise the facial and fingerprint scanners are rubbish. I have to put my number in most times. The rest of the phones' hardware is great. Software is a problem sometimes. It is getting better. There are very few programs I can't use. The obvious one is Google, but there are a few others that make it a bit annoying sometimes. I got round that problem by carrying a backup phone. Good phone if you use it a lot and the software you use is compatible with Huawei, otherwise give it a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Use For Internet Banking
customer_reviews.text: Because this is a Chinese phone America don't like it and Google is doing as it is told hence banking apps will not work on a Huewei or Honor phone. A huge disappointment. The phone itself seems very good in every other way.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and powerful core processor
customer_reviews.text: The camera on this is incredible. Better than I could ever have imagined, despite the fact that Leica is well-known for their cameras across the globe. Very easy to transfer data from my previous android phone. The core processor is powerful enough to run all of my apps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone, the most amazing camera takes incredible pictures. The battery life is out of this world I have charged it on average every fourth day. Quick charge too. This phone is well worth its price and better than any other brand I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Fly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. The battery life is amazing and the camera is something else. It does everything I can want it to and nothing I don't. Google assistant doesn't keep turning itself on on this phone either which is a big bonus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nukkua

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for about a week. So far so good. Camera is great with excellent night photos as well. Battery life is sufficient, if you don't use it up on playing intensive games. One downside are the included headphones, which are the most basic possible and do not match the great quality of the phone. A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Dzhuvinov

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money! I buy it as a present for one of my friend's, very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Probably great as a phone but not as a camera.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be just right for me because of the 40Mp camera and low light capability. How wrong was I. It is only 40Mp for a standard picture, if you do any amount of zoom (or switch to wide angle for that matter) the camera switches to 20Mp and the picture quality is grainy!! So what's the point. Colours are more than vivid (that's horribly garish). All rest of the phones features irrelevant. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ring Pirate

customer_reviews.title: It's smart
customer_reviews.text: Smart phone. I'm very pleased. Phone was well worth it. Just buy this phone if you can't decide, you won't regret it. Pictures are clearer, sounds are clearer. Battery lasts a while. Thank you Huawei x
customer_reviews.author: Louise M

customer_reviews.title: Superb so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, only had a few days so still discovering the many 'knobs and whistles' this phone comes with. The speed of the processor is superb, camera is amazing and jam packed with features! Will update the review after I've had it long enough to adapt it personally but I'm very impressed so far and would highly recommend this great handset.
customer_reviews.author: Canny

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, battery life, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera and battery, the finger print doesn't work so well though. The size is perfect, the display is amazing, easy to use, definitely a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Camila Da Silva Souza

customer_reviews.title: Review for the Huawei P30 pro
customer_reviews.text: It includes Google play which is what i wanted, easy to use and the blue colour is fairly attractive. Also, the theme app is unexpected but totally welcomed as it transforms my whole phone including the phone section and i can change it whenever i want.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Premium phone, excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely phone, premium look and feel. Camera is top notch Price was excellent for a premium phone. My second Huawei phone, never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Harding

customer_reviews.title: Huawei phones
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine with huawei phones I think I've been wasting my time and money with iPhone. Huawei gives you more options and more services with less money so my recommendation is don't buy iPhone. I phone is finished long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: saeed

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! You will never regret buying this one. At first I was skeptic because it was cheaper. My experience was beyond my expectation. The seller was also accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Abdifatah
customer_reviews.text: I had issue to use the phone, if I downloaded an app disappeared and lost my contacts. I couldn’t start, I did not let use my pin code. I spoke to customer service huawei they gave advice to return and reference number.
customer_reviews.author: Abdifatah Hussein

customer_reviews.title: It's a dualsim, turn the mini pocket
customer_reviews.text: People, it's a dualsim, you need to turn the mini pocket for the card, have one in top and if you turn have another one, sorry about my English, I'm Portuguese... The phone is amazing and beautiful, a give 5 stars easy 🙏
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've had so far. It is a good piece of kit can't go rong as it is at a good price. Can be difficult to get your head around using if you are used to another phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera and battery life. Good fingerprint sensor
customer_reviews.text: Good camera and battery life. Good fingerprint sensor. My phone is the dual SIM version even though the description read single SIM. Not going to complain as I'm using the function. Only drawback might be that in dual SIM version you have to choose whether you allocate the second SIM space to either a second SIM or a nano card to expand memory, as there is no way of expanding storage without sacrificing the second SIM
customer_reviews.author: A.F.A

customer_reviews.title: Wife was happy. Camera is great.
customer_reviews.text: Wife broke her Sony phone, it had a great camera but rubbish battery. I got this as I have an Honor View 10 and the life on that is great. The P30 camera is superb, easily as good if not surpassing the Sony. she was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant everything that you need plus more. Camera is out of this world.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Kershaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: was a christmas gift for my girlfriend we are very happy with it i got it for the oled screen looks great well worth the asking price
customer_reviews.author: Chris R Harper

customer_reviews.title: Super fast, great camera 512GB phone
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I've been waiting for, having had my last (Mi) phone for almost 3 years. The phone is so much faster than my old phone it makes a massive difference. 128GB is a little tight for me so I went for the 512 GB and I wasn't disappointed! Special shoutout to Livewire the seller who were very helpful
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Camera 👏
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad because it doesn't support apps that I want to use. You give up those apps for the sake of better quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years still the best smart telephone in the market FACT
customer_reviews.author: hanono miri

customer_reviews.title: Got 2 sim card slots
customer_reviews.text: This phone is just pure brilliance, got it today... What is even better, it says single sim but the one that I got has 2 slots so i got better than i thought... Thanks a mill, great ohine quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice but then!!!
customer_reviews.text: P30 PRO is an excellent day to day mobilr. It takes breath taking photos. Occasionally the pictures it takes when shared are not very clear. It's an excellent resource to have.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Due to the lack of support for Google play I cannot do banking or use most of my normal apps. Total waste of money and time. Useless!!!!!!?
customer_reviews.author: Ian Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great device works like it should. There is no case in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Yutaphong

customer_reviews.title: Terrible wifi
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, but the Wi-Fi let's it down, cannot maintain a connection to the router for more than ten minutes
customer_reviews.author: peter tukei

customer_reviews.title: Quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Since I switched over to Huawei devices I have had no issues and the P30 is no exception, with it's amazing 1080HD screen that delivers smooth and seamless display to the ability to hide the notch through in phone settings.The quality of pictures is amazing, and I mean absolutely amazing. The Zoom function is also second to non compared to any other phone that I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Fahmid Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is superb!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot be more than happy with my new phone, I was ecstatic with the battery life, I used to have an iPhone and totally did not regret ditching overly price phone for this cheaper with very superb batt life not to mention the amazing camera.
customer_reviews.author: AlexanderM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love. Owned now for a few months and I'm fully converted from iPhone! Battery life is amazing and only takes around 30 mins for a full charge! Camera is on point too.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my phone and the seller too. Item came even earlier than scheduled. The fingerprint recognition is not working perfectly but the phone usually unblock anyhow because it recognises my face
customer_reviews.author: veronica p.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastix phone. Battery life is great Camera is best in the world
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Senior

customer_reviews.title: no for me sorry i will stick to apple
customer_reviews.text: sent it back after a week never recognised face or fingerprint locked me out of banking app every time as i have to log on with face id
customer_reviews.author: preey

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: This smartphone is not easy to use it as a lot of problems. I can't get with Android system and Google popping up all the time. Sorry not for me, l'm an Apple man so l'm going back my old Apple phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kristofferson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect, screen quality is amazing. I only don't like the earphone.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, battery life, screen is great quality although some say its easy to smash so get a screen protector not that I've experienced any problems. Overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: Cathal

customer_reviews.title: Camera not as great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to camera specs as an upgrade, but preferred pics on my old Samsung galaxy, so returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epic camera, superfast charge
customer_reviews.text: Best phone out there, love it! Charges super quick, just amazing piece of technology really. The camera is epic.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's such a great phone for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: It is dual sim! Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: A few reviews say that once arrived it isn’t dual sim but it is, you put 2 sims either side of the tray, look in the tips app. Arrived quickly and good communication before delivery. No problems so far and love the phone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: As I expected and a great phone. Definitely worth the money considering the cost of competition brands! Glad I made the switch from a certain fruit company. The camera is Amazing and the main reason I bought this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Leila F.

customer_reviews.title: Well priced phone - very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size phone, doesn't really like my fingerprint, a couple of attempts needed to access, definitely didn't like my thumb lol.. must just be me!! No problems - so far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: anne harris

customer_reviews.title: Everything okay
customer_reviews.text: After two months of using I can tell everything is allright. Seller is genuine and even when I've been sent a wrong color we have been in touch within few minutes and the problem was solved.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Bought it for my daughter's 20th birthday gift, she's loving it! Camera is the best quality, a very nice looking phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: P30
customer_reviews.text: Amazing photos. Screen quality is really good. Design is perfect. And also customer service behaves perfectly. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Samet

customer_reviews.title: Generous Stroage 512GB, 2Sim love it
customer_reviews.text: I took a lot of photos and videos, 512GB, 2 sim card, very ideal for me. I like Huawei leica lenses camera, good in low light, zoom and the wide angle lens. Got all I need in a phone camera and economy friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Denholm

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this device overall. Camera is impressive and there are lots of convenient features such as screenshot, wifi call, gestures etc. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: xiao hu

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. Never bought a phone online before but it was a great price and the seller was as good as any big phone retailer. Probably better.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY J.

customer_reviews.title: Great all-rounder.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic so far. Quick, great screen and amazing camera. It took a picture of the moon for goodness sake... With a smartphone!
customer_reviews.author: gr1pp3r

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping brilliant phone. It says single sim on the description but I received the dial sim version which is even better. Don't know why but thank you. One of my best purchases on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Balazs Csernus

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Lovely slim line phone and camera in one.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Can’t find anything I dislike. Really pleased with quality of photos.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Health and photo what fun
customer_reviews.text: this is by far my favorite phone. I love the camera and the health app
customer_reviews.author: Martin Casey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, powerful phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, beautiful screen, high functioning device - better than my laptop
customer_reviews.author: ZW

customer_reviews.title: high value!
customer_reviews.text: my daughter likes it so much, really valuable for use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! The finger print and face recognition took some time to adjust to my print /face but now works really well. Love the camera and am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand Keller

customer_reviews.title: P30 midnight Black dual sim
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, really cool camera, great resolution and endless battery
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

product_meta.title: Huawei P30 Pro 128 GB 6.47 Inch OLED Display Smartphone with Leica Quad AI Camera, 8GB RAM, EMUI 9.1.0 Sim-Free Android Mobile Phone, Single SIM, Aurora, UK Version
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Aurora| Size Name:P30 proThe Huawei P30 Pro mobile features a 6.47" (16.51 cm) display with a screen resolution of 1080 x 2340 pixels and runs on Android v9.0 (Pie) operating system. The device is powered by Octa core (2.6 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 1.92 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 1.8 GHz, Quad core, Cortex A53) processor paired with 8 GB of RAM. As far as the battery is concerned it has 4200 mAh.
feature_bullets: The Leica Quad super camera system includes a SuperZoom Lens, a 40 MP Super Sensing Camera, a 20 MP Ultra Wide Angle Lens, and a HUAWEI TOF Camera, giving you the freedom to capture your incredible moments. Stunning selfies will be produced from the 32MP front camera.

Up to 50x Zoom - The new periscope telephoto lens allows more optical zooming capabilities to be tucked in a compact body without losing image quality. Together with the colour saturation provided by the 40 MP main camera, and stability of OIS, the SuperZoom Lens offers 10x hybrid zoom to see the never-before-seen with great resolution and rich detail.

See the splendor hidden in the night with up to ISO 409,600 on the HUAWEI P30 Pro. Also the colour sensing rule has been rewritten by HUAWEI from RGGB to RYYB for more light in all your images. The established cooperation among the HUAWEI SuperSpectrum sensor which contributes 40% increased light, ISP of Kirin 980 and the self-developed algorithm.

HUAWEI Dual-View Video - Two rear cameras work at the same time allowing you to watch the overall view of the game and zoom into the players’ exciting actions. Enjoy the moment from different perspectives. Also the upgraded HUAWEI Vlog’s features and effects are pre-installed in the HUAWEI P30 Pro for simple editing. A simple touch produces your own cinematic masterpiece.

6.47"" OLED | 7nm Kirin 980 chipset with EMUI 9.1 | 8GB + 128 GB | 4200 mAh with HUAWEI SuperCharge and Reserve Charge | IP68 water and dust resistant | HUAWEI Acoustic Display Technology instead of traditional top-front speaker.
